body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/dynamic/interface/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "hub2hub_overlay",
                    "description": "Hub-to-Hub Overlay",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "hub2hub_overlay",
                    "color": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Lo-HC",
                    "description": "Health-Check",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "Lo-HC",
                    "color": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Lo",
                    "description": "Main Loopback",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "Lo",
                    "color": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "vrf1_lan",
                    "description": "Lan of vrf1",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "port5",
                    "color": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "vrf2_lan",
                    "description": "Lan of vrf2",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "port6",
                    "color": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "vrf0_leak_zone",
                    "description": "Zone for leaked traffic from vrfs to DIA",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "vrf0_leak_zone",
                    "color": 2
                },
                                {
                    "name": "vrfs_leak_zone",
                    "description": "Zone for leaked traffic from vrfs to DIA",
                    "single-intf": 1,
                    "default-mapping": 1,
                    "defmap-intf": "vrfs_leak_zone",
                    "color": 2
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
